title: What is a DVA Patient?
body:
The Department of Veterans Affairs (DVA) is the main agency that provides services and creates programs to help veterans and the defence force communities.
A DVA Patient is someone acknowledged by DVA to get specific benefits in healthcare, like discounted medications through the Repatriation Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme (RPBS).
To learn how to create a DVA Patient Record, click here:
How to Create a DVA Patient Record
    If you need further assistance please contact support on 1300 103 903 or email at support@medirecords.com
